branchCategory.name: AM
branchCategory.description: <p>Series AM can separate and remove oil mist in compressed air, which is difficult to remove by ordinary air filters and removes solid particles such as rust or carbon of more than 0.1 micron. It is the most suitable for air sources that drive pilot, metal seal solenoid valves.</p>

branchItem.name: AM7/8/90D, Coalescing Mist Separator
branchItem.description: <p>Series AM can separate and remove oil mist in compressed air, which is difficult to remove by ordinary air filters and removes solid particles such as rust or carbon of more than 0.1 micron. It is the most suitable for air sources that drive pilot, metal seal solenoid valves.</p>
